roleset.name: exceed, be more than
roleset.note: OUTSTRIP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outstrip' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no framenet entry. Comparison with 'exceed'. (from outstrip.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: And the number of stocks hitting new lows far outstrips the number setting new highs.
example.arg: the number of stocks hitting new lows

example.name: with margin
example.text: Declining issues on the Big Board outstripped gainers 1,141 to 406.
example.arg: Declining issues on the Big Board
